document_name: Decree n Â° 2021-153 establishing aid for investments relating to rapid charging installations for electric vehicles on major roads
document_description: This document aims to promote the uptake of electromobility in the country. Art. 1 states that "a subsidy may be paid to companies making an investment relating to an activity of recharging service for electric vehicles in service areas located in the public motorway domain and in the public domain of the national road network".
